quests.title: Heidi - Trickster Registration
quests.condition: Level 1+, have Registration Form
quests.notes: Registration Form is obtained by talking to Heidi.
quests.request: Find and talk to Bunny Maid
quests.rewards: Rookie Sword, Rookie Hat, Rookie Shield

quests.title: Bunny Maid - Prove Your Spirit!
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Heidi - Trickster Registration
quests.notes: Baby Carrot is dropped by Torobbie (Lv.1).
quests.rewards: Level Up Guide, 2,000 Galder

quests.title: Bunny Maid - Helping Others
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Bunny Maid - Prove Your Spirit!
quests.rewards: Young Egg, 2,000 Galder

quests.title: Winnie - Winnie's Request
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Bunny Maid - Helping Others
quests.notes: Lifeguard Deen is found in Coral Beach Field 1, in front of Lifeguard Building.
quests.request: Find and talk to Lifeguard Dean
quests.rewards: 10x Lucky Pink Potion, 10x Lucky Blue Potion, Recovery Guide

quests.title: Lifeguard Deen - Deen's Request - 1
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Winnie - Winnie's Request
quests.rewards: 5x 500 Galder Coupon

quests.title: Lifeguard Deen - Deen's Request - 2
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Lifeguard Dean - Deen's Request - 1
quests.notes: Tinnie is found in Coral Beach Field 2, standing by the Beach Volleyball Court.
quests.rewards: 10x Lucky Pink Potion, 10x Lucky Blue Potion, 2,000 Galder

quests.title: Tinnie - Tinnie's Request - 1
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Lifeguard Dean - Deen's Request - 2
quests.rewards: 5x 500 Galder Coupon

quests.title: Tinnie - Tinnie's Request - 2
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Tinnie - Tinnie's Request - 1
quests.notes: Lifeguard Bean is found in Coral Beach Field 3, in front of a pond.
quests.request: Find and talk to Lifeguard Bean
quests.rewards: 10x Lucky Pink Potion, 10x Lucky Blue Potion, 2,000 Galder

quests.title: Lifeguard Bean - Bean's Request
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Tinnie - Tinnie's Request - 2
quests.notes: Cool Ice is dropped by Blue Penguin (Lv.6).
quests.rewards: Pocket Pouch, Shortcut Guide, 10,000 Galder

quests.title: Lifeguard Bean - Meet Don Giuvanni
quests.condition: Level 1+, have completed Lifeguard Bean - Bean's Request
quests.notes: Don Giuvanni is found in Gate of Desert Beach.
quests.request: Find and talk to Don Giuvanni
quests.rewards: 4,000 Galder
quests.nextEpisodeQuest: Don Giuvanni - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 1

quests.title: Don Giuvanni - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 1
quests.condition: Level 13+, Have completed Lifeguard Bean - Meet Don Giuvanni
quests.notes: Drilling for Dummies is obtained by completing Driller Marky - Master Drilling!.
quests.rewards: 5x Oasis Water, 5x Distilled Water, 5x Empty Potion Bottle, Drilling for Dummies

quests.title: Driller Marky - Master Drilling!
quests.condition: Level 13+
quests.notes: Tanning Oil is drilled in Gate of Desert Beach.
quests.rewards: Peng, Drilling for Dummies

quests.title: Don Giuvanni - Meet Officer Robert
quests.condition: Have completed Don Giuvanni - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 1
quests.notes: Officer Robert is in Beach Town - Paradise.
quests.request: Find and talk to Officer Robert
quests.rewards: 5x Oasis Water, 5x Distilled Water, 5x Empty Potion Bottle
quests.nextEpisodeQuest: Officer Robert - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 2

quests.title: Officer Robert - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 2
quests.condition: Have completed Don Giuvanni - Meet Officer Robert
quests.notes: Desert Potion is obtained by compounding Oasis Water + Distilled Water + Empty Potion Bottle with Compounder Paul in Paradise Shop.  Oasis Water,  Distilled Water, and  Empty Potion Bottle are obtained by completing Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 1 and Meet Officer Robert.
quests.rewards: 5x Hard Scales, Life Vest

quests.title: Officer Robert - Don's Push - 3rd Stage
quests.condition: Have completed Officer Robert - Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 2
quests.notes: Nate's Certification is obtained by completing Let's Try Maturing Compounding!.
quests.rewards: 20x Pink Potion B, 20x Blue Potion B, Wooden Sword

quests.title: Alchemist Nate - Let's Try Maturing Compounding!
quests.condition: Have Officer Robert - Don's Push - 3rd Stage in quest log
quests.notes: Life Vest and  Hard Scales are obtained by completing Don Giuvanni's Training Pt. 2.
quests.request: Compound Life Vest with Hard Scales
quests.rewards: Mature Compounding Guide, Nate's Certification

quests.title: Officer Robert - Don's Push - 4th Stage
quests.condition: Have completed Officer Robert - Don's Push - 3rd Stage
quests.notes: Refining Guide is obtained by completing Blacksmith Marx - Learn to Refine!.
quests.request: Refining Guide, Wooden Sword refined at Level 1
quests.rewards: Refining Guide, Hologram Port, 5x Beginner's Scroll of Revival

quests.title: Blacksmith Marx - Learn to Refine!
quests.condition: Have Officer Robert - Don's Push - 4th Stage in quest log
quests.notes: Bronze Fragment is drilled in 1st Mining Lot of Crystal Copper.
quests.rewards: Refining Guide, 7x Bronze Fragment, Wooden Sword

quests.title: Andrew - Meet the Natives!
quests.condition: Level 20+, have completed Officer Robert - Don's Push - 4th Stage
quests.notes:
Heart Gem is obtained by completing:

Clever Owl - The Owl's Worry / The Owl from that Time
Don Giuvanni - A Famous Model's Picture / Enemies in a Place like this?â€Ž
Dorothy - A Present for a Sick Friend (1) / Guardian of Dreams
Kristoffer J. - Weird Fisherman / Fished Up Scroll
Officer Tera - Help Keep the Peace / An Unexpected Encounter
Old Artist - Cherishing Destinies / The Painter from Notre Dame
Rosemary - Lookin' Good! / Runaway Student
Steve Ryu - Helping Confess / Wacky Confession
quests.rewards: Health Charm, 10x Wing Port (Paradise)

quests.title: Steve Ryu - Helping Confess
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Bunny
quests.notes: Bouquet is dropped by Hula Octopus (Lv.25).
quests.rewards: Bunny Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Steve Ryu - Wacky Confession
quests.condition: Level 20+, Bunny
quests.notes: Handkerchief of Challenge is obtained by completing Mermaid Babe - The Mark of Love!. When you start this quest, Steve Ryu gives Written Challenge.
quests.rewards: Bouquet, Heart Gem, Baby Bunny, Strong Ring

quests.title: Mermaid Babe - The Mark of Love!
quests.condition: Level 20+, have Steve Ryu - Wacky Confession is quest log
quests.notes: Red Lipstick is drilled at Desert Beach Field 2 - Sand Palace.  Written Challenge is obtained by starting Steve Ryu - Wacky Confession.
quests.rewards: Handkerchief of Challenge

quests.title: Don Giuvanni - A Famous Model's Picture
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Cat
quests.notes: Jenny's Photo B is drilled in Desert Beach Field 1 - Delta Island.
quests.rewards: Cat Card, 10x Blue Potion B, Heart Gem

quests.title: Don Giuvanni - Enemies in a Place like this?
quests.condition: Level 20+, Cat
quests.notes: Clam Meat is dropped by Shell Trap (Lv.19).
quests.rewards: Director's Letter, Kitten, Heart Gem, Solid Ring

quests.title: Clever Owl - The Owl's Worry
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Sheep
quests.notes: Golden Mole Feather is dropped by Golden Mole (Lv.20).
quests.rewards: Sheep Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Clever Owl - The Owl from that Time
quests.condition: Level 20+, Sheep
quests.notes: Magic Sealed Letter is drilled in Desert Beach Field 1 - Delta Island.
quests.rewards: Unsealed Letter, Lamb, Heart Gem, Smart Ring

quests.title: Kristoffer J. - Weird Fisherman
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Fox
quests.notes: Salt is drilled in Desert Beach Field 1 - Delta Island.
quests.rewards: 20x Salted Dry Fish, Fox Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Kristoffer J. - Fished Up Scroll
quests.condition: Level 20+, Fox
quests.notes: Earthworm is dropped by Golden Mole (Lv.20).
quests.rewards: Envelope with Photo, Fox Pup, Heart Gem, Accurate Ring

quests.title: Dorothy - A Present for a Sick Friend (1)
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Lion
quests.notes: Scorpion Jerky is dropped by Sea Scorpion (Lv.22).
quests.rewards: Lion Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Dorothy - Guardian of Dreams
quests.condition: Level 20+, Lion
quests.notes: Twinkle Star is dropped by Fanta Slime (Lv.18).
quests.rewards: Lion Cub, Child's Letter, Heart Gem, Accurate Ring

quests.title: Officer Tera - Help Keep the Peace
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Buffalo
quests.notes: Illegal CD is dropped by Grumpy Octopus (Lv.29).
quests.rewards: 500 Galder Coupon, Buffalo Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Officer Tera - An Unexpected Encounter
quests.condition: Level 20+, Buffalo
quests.notes: Illegal CD is dropped by Grumpy Octopus (Lv.29).
quests.rewards: 500 Galder Coupon, Buffalo Calf, Heart Gem, Strong Ring

quests.title: Old Artist - Cherishing Destinies
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Dragon
quests.notes: Paper is drilled in Desert Beach Field 2 - Sand Palace or purchased in Gate of Desert Beach Shop or Paradise Shop.  Color Pencils are dropped by Fanta Fish (Lv.21).
quests.rewards: Postcard, Dragon Card, 10x Pink Potion B, Heart Gem

quests.title: Old Artist - The Painter from Notre Dame
quests.condition: Level 20+, Dragon
quests.notes: Paper is drilled in Desert Beach Field 2 - Sand Palace or purchased in Gate of Desert Beach Shop or Paradise Shop.  Color Pencils are dropped by Fanta Fish (Lv.21).
quests.rewards: Postcard, Dragon Whelp, Heart Gem, Smart Ring

quests.title: Rosemary - Lookin' Good!
quests.condition: Level 20+, except Raccoon
quests.notes: Swimsuit is drilled in Desert Beach Field 2 - Sand Palace.
quests.rewards: Raccoon Card, Heart Gem

quests.title: Rosemary - Runaway Student
quests.condition: Level 20+, Raccoon
quests.notes: Pen is dropped by Fanta Fish (Lv.21).  Paper is drilled in Desert Beach Field 2 or purchased in Gate of Desert Beach Shop or Paradise Shop.
quests.rewards: Signed Agreement, Raccoon Cub, Heart Gem, Solid Ring
